name: Vital Throw
description: A slow fighting attack that pummels a creature. As an action on your turn, you hold this move until next turn, where it will automatically hit for 1d12 + MOVE fighting damage as long as the target remains in melee range.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

effect.name: Works great if the user goes last this turn.
effect.effect: 4 Appeal points if used last this turn, 2 Appeal points if not used last this turn.
